title: Chuang Tang Tu 2 Fengkuang Maxi Tuan
synopsis: In the peaceful and peaceful town of Chuangtang, a wonderful circus performance has just been staged. Unexpectedly, a rabbit that fell from the sky crashed the place. This bunny is the curious rabbit. Tangtang wanted to explain to the clown coral in the circus that he didn't intend to sabotage, but the clown wanted to take Brother Rabbit as punishment. At this dangerous juncture, the dignified opponent, the kitchen knife dog, appeared in time and saved Brother Rabbit, and a farce ended. In the fight with Clown Coral, Cai Knife vaguely discovered her secret. To find out, Cai Knife decided to go deep into the circus. In the underground of the circus, a crazy conspiracy was gradually uncovered by the chopper dog. On the other hand, Tangtang and his friends were enjoying the wonderful circus performance, and did not realize that a crazy crisis was coming. 　　What kind of crazy conspiracy is hidden in the crazy circus? Can Chopper Dog spread the news? How did Tangtang and his friends usher in a crazy battle? (translated from douban)

title: Chuang Tang Tu 3 Jiong Jiong Shiguang Ji
synopsis: The rabbit who likes to invent and create, wants to be recognized by Grandpa Rabbit, but every experiment always ends in an oolong failure. In order to prove himself, Chuangtangtu decided to conduct a bold experiment and develop a physical conveyor. As a result, in the experiment, the physical teleporter was accidentally upgraded into a super unstable time jumping machine, which caused a series of chaotic results. In order to prevent this chaotic future, Tangtang and its friends constantly used the time machine to modify the past and change the future. As a result, the more they modify, the more chaotic they are. In this chaotic day at home, in the backyard at home, Tangtang found that he, his father and grandpa These three generations have become the key to saving the world! 　　 This is an adventure about time, a story about understanding. (translated from douban)

title: Chuang Chuang Chuang! Wo Shi Chuang Tang Tu!
synopsis: "Crush!" "I am a chopper" is a hilarious three-dimensional animation series, a rough and clever chopper, a handsome, cool but chopping knife, seemingly dumb but clumsy, but not talking but magic Gua Gua, coupled with the crazy trick-or-treating expert Rabbit Brother, together staged the happy daily life of the little friends in the town. The whole play uses a small amount of dialogue, uses antics and rich body language performances, as well as funny daily life stories, so that the rabbit and his friends will take you to experience the fun of pure animation. Must make you happy! (translated from douban)

title: Chuang Tang Tu Zhi Chong'Ai Da Zuozhan
synopsis: In order to win the love of the beloved girl, Chuangtang Bunny and Little Carrot decided to use the conventional method of door-to-door flower delivery to let the girl know themselves, but they met the girl’s pet dog, and a flower delivery war quietly began... (translated from douban)

title: Ryuu to Sobakasu no Hime
synopsis: The movie will take place inside the virtual world of "U" along with its 5 billion registered users, focusing on the themes of coming of age, family ties, and the links between our lives. (Source: MAL News)

title: Lao La De Xingxing Zai Zhongguo
synopsis: A star that fell to the ground and broke a calf was accidentally picked up by Laura. Under Laura's meticulous care, the stars gradually regained their former vitality, and wherever they went, the light from the stars made Laura's dolls miraculously alive. 　　 However, the secrets of Laura and Xingxing were almost revealed because of a trip to China. On the way to China, the star and Laura were accidentally separated. Laura was very anxious, but China is so big that it is not easy to find a lost star. 　　 At the same time, the Chinese girl Lingling was surprised to find that Nian, the beast in ancient Chinese legends, was resurrected. The star is taken in by the little Chinese girl Lingling. It was originally just a "year" in a costume, but by chance, it was also resurrected because of the magic of the stars. 　　 The connection of fate makes Laura, Xingxing, Lingling and Nian meet in the night sky, leaving their laughter and laughter in the night sky of China. 　　 But in a calm night, a black cloud enveloped the sky over the city... 　　 When they broke up, Laura and Lingling said goodbye, and the joyful laughter of the two girls stayed in China. Source: Century Global Online(translated from douban)

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing
synopsis: In the world, one is afraid of the word "serious", and the protagonist of this animation is the person who speaks "seriously" the most. He came to Tianzhu from Dongtu Datang to ask for truth, but anyone who has no problem mind Never do that. But he did it, and he did it so resolutely and purely. He is Xuanzang, a Jin Chanzi who had listened to the scriptures at the feet of the Tathagata in his previous life, and was once one of the top ten disciples of the famous Tathagata. It was just because he made a short trip while listening to the scriptures, he was demoted to the mortal world by the Tathagata, shouldering the heavy responsibility of seeking the truth, and tasted the life and death of the world, the bitterness and bitterness... In fact, things are far from being as simple as the surface. It was only because of the abdication of the Buddha Burning Lamp that Shakyamuni became the highest leader of the altar. But everything has a cause and effect. Although Shakyamuni managed the gods in an orderly manner, he would never escape the day when Maitreya Buddha would replace him.(translated from douban)

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing season2
synopsis: "Invincible Stars 2", also known as "Happy Journey to the West", is a high-definition television series of cartoons adapted from KIZI's famous online novel "Hip Travel". It is the second part of this series. The story reinterpreted the story of Tang Seng and his apprentices who went through difficulties and obstacles along the way and went to the west to learn the scriptures in a funny way. As a humorous alternative cartoon, "Invincible Treasure 2" is loyal to the original, but it has a different form of expression from the original. (translated from douban)

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing 3
synopsis: The Jade Emperor gave them the task of organizing the Heavenly Court archives that no one wanted to do. Several members did not expect that the archives recorded in Tiangong were "experiential", and each administrator could intervene in the memories of the events recorded in the archives to experience. 　　 So, the group of Treasure Hunting Group started a novel adventure of rewriting the archives. (translated from douban)

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing 4
synopsis: It is said that after the Jade Emperor arranged for the Tang monk and his apprentice to organize the Tianting files. As a result, the entire Heavenly Court was flying, and the Jade Emperor was blocked by the gods at the gate of the High Heaven Hall. All the immortals were emotional, and forced the Jade Emperor to dismiss the four masters and apprentices with the spirit of swearing to the death if he failed to succeed. Although the Jade Emperor regretted his death a long time ago, after all, he was a family member of the Tathagata Buddha, and the work of the Tianting archives management was arranged by himself. Now that they are expelled, they seem to be a little self-slapped, thinking twice, and deciding that the trouble will flow to outsiders. Tian, let these bloody fellows go to his distant cousin Zeus and cousin Odin.(translated from douban)

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing Da Dianying Zhi Jin Gu Bang Chuanqi
synopsis: On a dark and windy night for a month, Monk Tang and his disciples took a nap in the deserted ruined temple by the roadside, and the hard-working Drifter was unsurprisingly drawn to the "Village" sign. Days of hard work finally broke out that night, and the Drifting monk could not resist the call of the Hades and passed out, and the heavy task of asking for the elixir of resurrection naturally fell on Sun Wukong, "the first male publicist in heaven." But before he could get the medicine back, Tang Seng, who was proficient in medicine, couldn’t bear to show his talents. After a cardiopulmonary resuscitation, the soul of Sha Lao San was tossed back, and the fairy medicine that Monkey King retrieved was accidentally spilled The golden cudgel to the side... 　　 The invincible magic weapon has become a graceful young woman! And she is precisely Pinxiang who was punished by the Jade Emperor for being privately mortal. The news of "Monkey King lost the golden cudgel" spread like wildfire. The Bull Demon King immediately assembled various monsters to form a subcommittee to denounce the Journey to the West and encircle the four masters and disciples. After hearing the wind, Pinxiang also wanted to take Tang Seng's life under the instigation of a traitor...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 夺宝幸运星大电影之金箍棒传奇

title: Duo Bao Xingyun Xing Da Dianying Zhi Jin Gu Bang Chuanqi 2: Sha Seng De Ni Xi
synopsis: Tang Seng was captured by the monster, and the remaining Monkey King, Zhu Bajie, and Drifting quarreled because of a crisis of trust. The situation was very critical for a while. It turned out that the Drifting was a half-demon who went astray, but at the very moment of his death, he got the enlightenment and returned to the right way. The Tathagata Buddha gave a very important task to the Drifting Monk. This task is to secretly help the Western Star Monkey Sun Wukong. After some twists and turns, the three brothers finally resolved their misunderstandings and followed the clues to a different space. Here, waiting for them is the powerful Four Heavenly Kings of the Nether. Only by passing through the four evil palaces they guarded can they break the knot. World, rescue Tang Seng. However, the Drifters and others who fought bravely to rescue Master did not know that they had fallen into a trap carefully set by the leader of Tai Sui Special Forces. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 夺宝幸运星大电影之金箍棒传奇2:沙僧的逆袭

title: Shenmi Shijie Lixian Ji 4
synopsis: Hugo and her father Dashan live in an ordinary small village, but she has been to an unknown magical place, where is the mysterious world. In a magical space parallel to the human world, ordinary people entering the mysterious world will become animals in three days. Legend has it that the god created this magical world. Every year 99 animals are selected here and become citizens. The patriarch is a strange animal. It is called Lala, Hugo’s best friend. 　　 Hugo has never seen his mother since he remembered. Dashan told Hugo that his mother was doing scientific research outside all year round. Hugo missed her mother very much and wrote to her often. One day, Hugo suddenly discovered that the letter she wrote to her mother had not been sent away, but had been hidden by the mountain. Hugo asked about his mother's whereabouts, and Da Shan had to tell the truth hidden in his heart for many years. It turned out that Hugo's mother had also discovered the mysterious world. 　　 In order to find the whereabouts of their mother, Hugo and Dashan once again went to the mysterious world. The appearance of Hugo brought a morning full of surprises to the mysterious world. Hugo meets his friends in the mysterious world again. The patriarch Lala’s spells have made rapid progress, and Uncle Xiong has a crush on the aboriginal leader Lan, who has both kung fu and beauty. Good friends are immersed in the joy of reunion. A crazy penguin appears. It says that the mysterious world is about to be destroyed because an evil dragon broke into the land of God... (translated from douban)

title: Wo Shi Da Xiongmao
synopsis: In the large forest in the remote plateau area, the panda family leads a carefree life. In the panda home, there is a red panda Hobby and his mother who also live here, but Hobby (voiced by Liu Chunyan) is white all over. It is a little white bear that has always been regarded as an alien by its kind, so the red panda always wants to leave the panda park. But the red fox (voiced by Zhang Ai) and the cheetah (voiced by Han Qiaoen) on the other side have been eyeing the panda homeland, always wanting to occupy the panda park, but one day the panda paradise was turned into a ruin when a landslide broke out and a flash flood occurred. After a long journey, when the disaster happened, Hobby’s mother lost her precious life to save Hobby. At the same time, the cheetahs were chasing after him. The red panda Hobby had to work with his friends and the red panda family through clever wisdom and tenacity Fighting with their perseverance, they finally defeated the evil red fox and found their new home. Through this story, the little panda Hobby has become a real black and white panda, and it is also a real story of growing up.(translated from douban)

title: Kengan Ashura
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Wo Shi Da Xiongmao Zhi Xiongmao Da Xia
synopsis: The panda family has lived on the earth for 8 million years and is called "living fossil" by the world. According to legend, the panda's ancestor, the panda hero, is capable of hoeing the strong and supporting the weak, winning a lofty status for the panda clan, leading the clan to live in the bamboo forest outside the world, and even exhausted his efforts to set up a gossip panda array that no one can crack before his death. Defend against foreign enemies. 　　 Hobby, one of the many pandas, loves three things in his life-love to eat, love to play treasures, and love to be a hero! The biggest dream is to become the panda hero he admires most. However, in the face of the ridicule of other panda friends, the growing strength of the heroine panda Cici, and the eccentricity of the guardian elder, Hobby stole the secret book and ran into the forest under the name of the panda hero. , I really made myself an idol in the eyes of animals such as the "Skyfall" group. 　　 The confident Hobby didn't realize that the danger was approaching. The forest's first "flattering" red fox covets the panda, the "Tang monk meat among animals", and advocates that the king of the forest, the snow leopard, hunts pandas. Snow leopards with simple minds and well-developed limbs repeatedly attacked Hobby, and even cracked the invasion of the "Gossip Panda Array" into the outer bamboo forest. Seeing that the catastrophe of the panda clan is coming, Habi decided to work hard to become a real panda hero to save the clan and complete the great mission of restoring the panda clan... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 我是大熊猫之熊猫大侠

title: Wo Yu La La
synopsis: Maima has no time to take care of Maimi because she works in a neighboring village, so she has been fostered at her grandma's home. When her grandma passed away, Mai Ma had to temporarily entrust Mai Mi to her uncle. Mai Mi and her mother are inseparable. Mai Mu gave Mai Mi a piece of chocolate and a watch before leaving and told her that she would take her to her mother's school soon. But as soon as the car drove away, Mai Mi found that the hands of the watch no longer moved. (translated from douban)

title: Tu Tu Weiji
synopsis: "Tutu Crisis" is the theatrical version of the Oriniu series of cartoons, telling the adventures of Orinu and his partners. At the birthday party, Orinu received his father's birthday gift-a carnival trip to Rocky Town. Everyone came to the town enthusiastically, but unexpectedly encountered the runaway of the lucky rabbit and the bad guy Nissen. With the help of the mayor and rabbit Xiaobai, Oriniu and his party defeated the lucky rabbit and Neeson, and obtained the energy ball with the magic power to control the town. To everyone's expectation, the mayor took advantage of everyone's unpreparedness and took the energy ball away, and said that he was the master of Nissens. The mayor stunned Orinius with an energy ball and repelled his partner. Just as he was about to turn the whole town into his puppets, the power of love awakened Orinius. At the very moment, Oriniu subdued the mayor with the help of everyone, regained the energy ball, and brought the town back to life.(translated from douban)

title: Chong Fan Dahai
synopsis: A flying fish family lives in the waters of New York Bay. The young flying fish Kevin (voiced by Li Junyu) has been selected by his father as the head fish of the next generation. He dreams of one day leading the whole family to Barbados, the hometown of Flying Fish. After a quarrel, he impulsively ventured to challenge the fishing area of humans. Unfortunately, he was arrested and went to the fish tank of a restaurant in Chinatown. The whereabouts of the family's ancestral pearls are also unknown. In the restaurant, Kevin met the restaurant owner's son Xiaobao (voiced by Lin Ying), a Chinese kid who seemed introverted and silent but loved adventure in his heart. His father, Dabao, forces him to practice cooking every day, so as to meet the challenges of his competitors with malicious intent, or to take over the family class in the future. The two knew each other and gained friendship. At this moment, the Kevin family pearl was suddenly thrown back into the fish tank by New York robber Jack (voiced by Meng Fei) while avoiding the police. Next, because of this accident, Kevin, Xiaobao, Jack, and the fish in the fish tank, these different worlds were intertwined together, and a series of thrilling, humorous and warm stories happened. (translated from douban)

title: Bate La Er Chuanshuo
synopsis: Every few years, a very powerful demon will attack the Nanlu tribe. This year, as the patriarch of the Nanglu clan, Habu, in order to protect the clan, he blocked the Great Demon by himself, but was unfortunately taken away by the Great Demon. The brand-new Great Demon King claimed that if the Nanglu tribe did not exchange them for new young men, they would eat Habu. Bei Luling (voiced by Ji Guanlin) used Tana's grandmother to give her magic power to summon a boy from another world, intending to use this boy as food for the Great Demon in exchange for her father. And the legend of the great demon king in the Nanlu clan is exactly the trial that the next patriarch must go through. Beiluling successfully completed the trial and became the new warrior of the clan, inheriting the responsibility of her father to continue to protect the clan. The whole incident was over, and the Nanlu people returned to their former calm. Li Zhiyu (voiced by Jiang Guangtao), who also learned to be strong during the adventure, also returned to his own world. Both young people have truly matured in this incident.(translated from douban)

title: Jintian·Mingtian
synopsis: A few hard work today, a few harvests, the green mountains and clear waters, the rest will continue. After thousands of years, I have no worries about wine, and there is no worry about things coming and going. The sea changes the land, the Big Dipper is in the world, and the world is in the dust, what can be desired. Even Angela, who is heavenly, cannot escape the earthquake or separation. And what really makes us brave in disasters is hope, friendship, and our own heart. Therefore, King Mila of Fudge has shouldered the important task of saving the world, with a fat panda named Lelexiong, a silly frog who loves hiphop, a big duck who dreams of becoming a Peking duck, and an unusually mysterious Shana Sister, we started the journey of flicking the King and shaking the sky in the dark. In the face of Hei Zhentian who is a big international flicker, can they succeed in flickering? Can a big duck become a Peking duck? Is the legendary angel an "angel" or a "shit"? Can they escape disaster? Can Mira keep the name of King of Fudge? All of these mysteries are slowly revealed in the constant disasters, parting and reunion, in friendship and hope, in the gap between today and tomorrow.(translated from douban)

title: Yunduo Baobei
synopsis: According to the age characteristics of 3-6 years old, "Baby Cloud" interprets the content of the story with a new animation structure. According to the children's viewing habits, the structure of the film has been re-adjusted for children. The film has a 1-minute title at the beginning, followed by 9 minutes of story and 2 minutes of singing and dancing, followed by 5 minutes of interaction and 3 minutes of singing and dancing ending, the whole film is 20 minutes in total. Fresh and cheerful songs are inserted in the film and at the end of the film. Different music is changed every 7 episodes, and there is a strong dance for children to learn. 　　 The 39 episodes of the first season of "Baby Clouds" introduce 13 episodes of animals, 13 episodes of plants, and 13 episodes of natural phenomena. The stories are classified according to the level of children's education. The simple and clear plot and vivid and cute characters make children watching the movie feel that they are the protagonist of the story. They spontaneously enter the fairy tale world of "Baby Clouds", follow Feifei and Piaopiao to discover and solve problems together, and bring them to the children "We grow up together" experience. In addition, a 5-minute interactive session is inserted in the film, combined with the knowledge points in the episode's story, and the children and the protagonist interact with each other in a fun way to understand the world. Thus, children's thinking can be expanded and children's ability to think independently can be strengthened.(translated from douban)

title: Wu Jianxiong
synopsis: The movie "Wu Jianxiong" tells the growth process of Wu Jianxiong from birth to graduation from middle school in 90 minutes. With vivid characters and touching and interesting stories, it vividly and delicately shows the story of Wu Jianxiong's cleverness, studious and courage to explore. Wu Jianxiong was born in Liuhe Town, Taicang, Jiangsu, China. She is known as "the world's most outstanding female experimental physicist" and "Madam Curie of the East". She has been received by Premier Zhou Enlai and Deng Xiaoping many times. In 1994, he was elected as the first batch of foreign academicians of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He has won numerous international awards and is a well-known Chinese-American physical scientist with global influence. She is the pride of our China and the pride of our nation. However, the awareness of her among Chinese citizens, especially among the youth groups, is extremely low. In today's materialistic age, the temptation of various interests has a great influence on children. According to the survey, the proportion of children who want to be scientists in the future is less than 10%, while the proportion of children who want to be bosses is more than 60%. In addition, the rapid development of China's economy has caused an imbalance in the development of material and spiritual food. Therefore, stimulating and cultivating young people's interest in science, establishing an "idolatry" of scientists, and paying attention to the construction of young people's spiritual civilization have become the top priorities of our society as a whole. We incorporate the unique Loudong painting school, Jiangnan Sizhu and other regional cultures into the animation film and television works. Let scientists form a heart-to-heart communication with today’s teenagers in the image of a kind and ordinary girl next door with the touching, interesting life and learning stories of the scientist’s teenage years, so that the children who are in the temptation of various interests can calm down for a while, and Find a little shadow of yourself in the protagonist, subtly and entertaining. The great strategy of "scientific development concept" and "rejuvenating the country through science and education" put forward by General Secretary Hu Jintao is mainly accomplished by the young generation.(TRANSLATED FROM DOUBAN)

title: Feng Shen Chuanqi Zhi Qu Mo Yingxiong
synopsis: The king of Yin Shangyun was faint and innocent, coveted the beauty of the Nvwa immortal, and blasphemed the gods. Under the advocacy of the great wizard Fei Zhong, he decided to build the Tongtianlutai and conquer the two realms of the demon. The Empress Nuwa decided to punish the monarch, and appointed the nine-tailed spirit fox to become a demon, Dajifan, to confuse King Zhou and accelerate the demise of the Shang Dynasty. Under the tyrannical tyranny of King Zhou and heavy taxation, the lives of the world were smashed, the people were not living, the monk Jiang Shang was determined to assist the Xiqi general Ji Chang in the uprising against business, and to give the world a peace of justice and evil, civilization and barbarism. The battle is about to start... (translated from douban)

title: ZhEngjiU Di 365 Tian
synopsis: The story takes place in the ancient East, where people live in a peaceful and peaceful environment; however, a shadow of hatred is pressing in the darkness, and life is instantly destroyed! Life is at stake! Then, in the desperate situation, who would be the hero who stood up and down? He is "light"! An "alternative" with unknown life experience! 　　 On the 365th day, the mystery of his life experience was revealed, but he was extremely entangled. On the 365th day, what happened to him? On the 365th day, who did he save? Or who saved the "light"? (translated from douban)

title: Dabing Jinbao Lixian Ji
synopsis: The timid and kind-hearted Jin Bao is a big soldier of the Liang State. He has always longed for a peaceful country without war-a beautiful country. Although Jin Bao is often laughed at by others, he still believes in it. One day, Liang Guo’s barracks were attacked by an enemy country. Jin Bao was forced to fall into the abyss in order to escape the enemy’s soldiers. Jin Bao, who knew he was inevitable, still hoped to go to the beautiful country before he died. At this moment, his grandfather sent him away. His necklace suddenly shined a strong light, allowing Jin Bao to travel through time and space to an unknown magical country, that is, the beautiful country he has been thinking about day and night. However, the beautiful country in front of him is not as beautiful and peaceful as Jin Bao imagined. It has been invaded by the evil king. Jinbao turned into a panda when he came to the beautiful country. It was even misunderstood by Feitianzhu, a scout from the Anti-Magic Army, that he was the panda hero who saved the beautiful country. Jin Bao, who couldn't figure it out, followed the Flying Pig on the road. On the way, Jin Bao met Guai Li Mantis, Onion Dog, Ginseng Elf, Charcoal, and Seven Little Fortunes. Everyone became Jin Bao's companions. Later, Jinbao finally met the Lion King, the leader of the Anti-Magic Army. 　　 Jinbao learned from the Lion King that his grandfather was the panda brave who saved the beautiful country back then, so he made up his mind to inherit his grandfather’s will and vowed to rescue the white dragon princess from the demon king and restore peace to the beautiful country. Jin Bao grew rapidly under the arduous training of the Lion King, and led several anti-magic warriors including the Seven Little Fortunes to march towards the devil's mobile castle. After numerous obstacles, Jin Bao and others overcame all kinds of difficulties, and finally came to the front of the Ten Thousand Demon King Hydra. Under the leadership of Jinbao, everyone united and finally worked together to defeat the Hydra and successfully rescued the White Dragon Princess, allowing the beautiful country to restore its former peace. (translated from douban)

title: Laoban De Nuren
synopsis: "Pedestrians on the left" film and television culture company is a place full of joy, where there are a group of enthusiastic, witty, slightly insignificant but without losing a sense of justice, and pervert bosses with nouveau riche tastes. One day, the busty beauty Luo Xiaowei came to apply for the boss's secretary and was accepted by the boss on the spot. As expected by the employees, the boss announced that everyone left work early that afternoon, leaving only the new secretary Luo Xiaowei to work overtime. After get off work, the boss exhausted his organs and wanted to overwhelm Luo Xiaowei, but didn't want to show up unexpected guests...(translated from douban)

title: Xin Ba Da Lixian Ji 2013
synopsis: Sinbad (voiced by Yang Ou) is a penniless poor boy, but he lives a happy life every day. Aladdin (voice by Orioles) is a rich son born with a golden spoon, but he is very envious of Sinbad's free life as he pleases. The two childhood sweethearts have forged a solid friendship since they were young, and they often incur ridiculous misfortunes. By chance, Sinbad found a mysterious drifting bottle by the sea. The letter in the bottle reads that in a very, very distant place, there lived an evil and terrifying cyclops, he not only occupied countless Wanguan Treasure, and also imprisoned the beautiful and kind princess Atura, as long as he obtains the moonlight rose with powerful magic power, he can defeat the Cyclops. Sinbad yearned for money, Aladdin admired the princess, and in this way, the two embarked on an adventure.(translated from douban)

title: Xin Ba Da Lixian Ji 2
synopsis: At the end of the previous episode "The Adventures of Sinbad 2013", Sinbad, Aladdin and Eluru successfully completed the adventure of the Cyclops Castle and received a wonderful magic lamp. Everyone will realize their good wishes. But the magic lamp genie who came out of the magic lamp suffered from amnesia, and the plan of using magic to realize the wishes of the three people was in vain. 　　 The three naughty little friends, of course, are not reconciled to fail, and are determined to join hands to solve the mystery of the realization of the wish. On this completely unknown magic island, there are many difficulties along the way. The adventure king Sorohan is petrified, Ellu is drawn by the bad guys, Sinbad and Aladdin are forced to leave, and the magic lamp is once again caught in the trap of King Yede. Among them, in the face of various difficulties, can they successfully break through the mysterious magic island? (translated from douban)

title: Wo De Laopo Shi Zhi Mao
synopsis: When Xiaoji the American cat meets Axiang the African mouse, he once thought it would be a fight between natural enemies, but didn't want to. It was a terrifying love that rejoiced in enemies. 　　 But the love of cat and mouse is destined to be a taboo love that is not blessed. Faced with the gangsters Ji and Ah Xiang, who are about to be driven away by the cat family, they kill and slaughter harshly. The spleen is full of positive energy in love seeking his own true love all the way, and finally won the cat family’s approval and stay with them forever.(translated from douban)

title: Shaonian Yuefei
synopsis: Yue Fei is a famous general in the Southern Song Dynasty and a well-known national hero in our country. With his epic achievements, he has created a personality monument that will stand forever, his patriotism in serving the country, his filial piety thought of respecting his parents, and his national righteousness. Quality has become the cultural soul of the Chinese nation from generation to generation. In the national development process of national rejuvenation and China's rejuvenation, we need to inherit and carry forward the selfless and fearless spirit of Yue Fei as a model of national culture that takes the rise and fall of the country as his responsibility and actively joins the WTO.(translated from douban)

title: Zhongji Da Maoxian
synopsis: This is a comedy cartoon released in 2013. An isolated island-Solmen Island. Decades ago, a group of people landed on the island for various reasons. They seem to be no different from ordinary people, but their daily behavior is different from ordinary people. On the island, banks are not locked. The skinny bank president is not afraid of losing gold bars at all. He has a unique set of preventive measures. Scientists are keen to destroy and explode, no one knows what they are thinking. There are many strange primitive plants on the island, which seem to have indescribable vitality. The residents of the island may seem ordinary, but in fact they are unpredictable. At this time, a self-proclaimed young man in the workplace and an optimistic and free photographer began their adventure. The young man in the workplace is going to sell security doors on the island, and the photographer wants to go to the island to explore the unknown secrets. ......(translated from douban)

title: Zheng He 1405: Mo Hai Xun Zong
synopsis: The young boy Qianlang and the girl Swallow explored the South China Sea. Suddenly, a typhoon struck the ship, and the two fell into the sea. Qian Lang found a strange blue and white porcelain on the bottom of the sea. The blue and white porcelain stores a large number of images of Zheng He's voyages to the West six hundred years ago. Under certain conditions, blue and white porcelain flashed Zheng He's voyage to the West. It turns out that this blue and white porcelain was the brush used by Zheng He when he wrote the "Logbook". The magical blue and white porcelain reappears the scenes of Zheng He's voyage and dangers and his nine deaths. Fierce beasts, violent waves, dangerous pirates, and inexplicable diseases have threatened Zheng He's fleet time and time again. However, under the command of Zheng He, the fleet united, worked together, and fought hard, they attacked wisely and turned good luck, smiling proudly all the way. (translated from douban)

title: Lulin Da Maoxian
synopsis: In the coming era, all plants on the earth will wither. During this period, Tiandi Company developed artificial plants, but the results were not satisfactory after being put into the market, which made the company's boss Kun (voiced by Li Chuanying) and director Wen Jing (voiced by Yang Menglu) very troubled. Wen Jing's daughter Xiao Yu (voiced by Zhang Anqi) wholeheartedly looked forward to spending her birthday with her mother, but she waited all night. The angry little guy went to the Tiandi Company to find his mother, but was concentrated by a beam of blue light by accident. This light comes from a space transfer device developed by Tiandi Company, which transmits light rain to a beautiful planet full of green plants and strange creatures. When chased by the monster, she was rescued by the blue-skinned boy Buhler (voiced by Li Zhengxiang). It turned out that Dr. Sun of Buhler (voiced by Wang Xiaobing) came here 12 years ago to find wisdom tree species in order to develop a new simulation plant gene. 　　 Mysterious unknown world, Xiao Yu is about to experience the most important adventure of his life...(translated from douban)

title: Sheng Long Qibing Da Maoxian
synopsis: A long time ago, in the ancient Central Plains, there were thousands of hectares of grain fields and the fragrance of rice. The neighboring wild wolf clan outside the Great Wall has been eyeing this wealthy land. So, twelve years later, a paper war book came. A big battle is inevitable! 　　 In the ancient city of Phoenix, the good fortune of fate pushed the six ordinary teenagers, Shier, Red Sleeve, Jiujin, Giant Elephant, Big Flower Noodle, and Mad Cow, to the forefront of this war. 　　 Shier, he was an orphan. Because I work hard in the fruit bar all year round, and follow the old master to practice martial arts, he has practiced his unique stunt "Flying Cloud Link Legs", playing with five teenagers of the same age without restraint, and deep in my heart share the hot punishment Yangshan and martial arts dream grow up happily! Soldiers approached the city, and the bizarre life experiences of several teenagers surfaced. The wolf clan leader who provoked the war turned out to be Shi'er's biological father, and the red sleeve who had been fighting side by side with him turned out to be the only beloved daughter of the Central Plains Emperor; The love of the flesh and blood of father and son is thicker than water, the kindness of nurturing by the villagers is as heavy as a mountain, and the love of companions is thinner! The hearts of the teenagers are ups and downs, it is hard to choose! 　　 Great love has no boundaries, and the world is in common. Since ancient times, a hero has been born a teenager, and the true sage warrior is daring to take risks, and the blood of chivalry is boiling in his bones. Personal obsession to abandon one side, how to use a trick "Fengwu Nine Heavens" to turn the tide. A thought of success or failure, between choices, play a young heroic dream, compose a piece of chivalrous bowels! (translated from douban)

title: 81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Baowei Mai Ji
synopsis: There is an isolated paradise in the barren desert called Farm No. 81. A long time ago, an alien elf accidentally fell here. He was called Mai Card. The child Wang Xiaobao, the cute and cowardly Dandan, and the often confused Bobo are MaiCard's best friends. Children have only one dream, that is "flying". 　　Under the cover of the night, the field mice stealing food group are sneaking into the farm to steal food, and the terrible flying devil also rushes into the farm to perform a secret mission-catching wheat cards. Farm 81, immersed in darkness, is perilous. The four friends who saw all this knew that it was time to take off, fighting for their dreams and homeland! Everything is ready, the four friends fly into the sky in the ultimate fighter, the farm is caught in a fierce air battle. They used their ingenuity to defeat all enemies and defend Mai Card and their homeland. (translated from douban)

title: 81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Fengkuang De Mai Ji
synopsis: While the entire farm was still immersed in the joy of the successful development of Superpower, evil and powerful alien monsters invaded Farm 81. 　　 After everyone worked together to repel the first wave of attacks by alien monsters, they all blindly believed in the power of Superpower and gradually forgot the existence of the crisis, but Xiaobao found traces of alien monsters on the farm. 　　 Facing the distrust of the people, the broken friendship with the Maccard, the approaching monsters, and the confusing true and false friends. Xiaobao resolutely embarked on the difficult and dangerous path of defending friendship and defending the farm. Can he regain his trust? Can you restore the friendship with McCard? Can you defeat a powerful alien monster? Everything is just beginning. (translated from douban)

title: Qingwa Wangguo
synopsis: The story takes place in a fictional kingdom, where a group of lively and kind frogs live. The four-year sports meet is approaching. In the previous games, the final champion can become a warrior to protect the kingdom. This time, the winner can marry the princess of the Frog Kingdom. Therefore, the warriors all over the country are gearing up and preparing Some. 　　 What everyone didn't expect was that at this moment, the frog princess ran away from home and became a member of the sports meeting. She met a strong opponent, the lightning frog, and the two were fighting against each other. While the frog country was thriving, the king of the snake country next door was brewing a sinister conspiracy. It was once cut off by the king of the frog country, hoping to take this opportunity to be ashamed. The king of the snake country sent traitors from the frog country to participate in the games, and the tension was on the verge of breaking out.(translated from douban)

title: Taikong Xiongmao Lixian Ji
synopsis: The space panda of the panda planet in the universe caused the big bang to protect the panda planet and the Sirius war in the dark universe. With the energy of the big bang, the space panda accidentally broke into the earth and got to know the little ones on the earth. Tai, Xiaoshang, and Liufu planet's tweeted horses, moo cows, bleated sheep, giggled chickens, barking dogs, and humming pigs. 　　 Sirius became an energy meteorite under the action of the Big Bang and followed it to the Liufu planet. After merging with the black rat, he became a genetic monster. His ability greatly increased. He disintegrated the space panda clone. 　　 In order to save the five avatars of the space panda, everyone traveled through time and space together, across the five spaces of gold, wood, water, fire, and earth, and fought against the black rat and the five rat king. Finally, they won the victory and bid farewell to the genetic baby Liufuxing and return to the panda planet. (translated from douban)

title: Taikong Xiongmao Zongdongyuan
synopsis: Panda Planet is celebrating the centennial celebration. All the pandas are immersed in a sea of joy. At this moment, the evil Rat Commander launched an attack on Panda Planet, turning all pandas into clowns. The space panda (played by Yi Xiaoyin) and its friends escaped by a fluke, and the group came to a secret base under the planet Panda. 　　 In order to save the panda clan, the space panda needs to find a secret artifact that has been lost for many years. At the same time, Commander Rat is also looking for an artifact. It wants to use the power of the artifact to gain the supreme power to unify the universe. The two parties began to compete for the magical weapon. Commander Rat was born sinister and cunning, how should the upright and courageous cosmic panda face its numerous tricks? Time is passing by one minute and one second, can the space panda's rejuvenation be completed successfully? (translated from douban)

title: Taikong Xiongmao Yingxiong Guilai
synopsis: The emerald star is the only home for the panda family to survive. However, in recent days, this originally beautiful planet has been extensively destroyed, and its devastation is about to reach the end of its life. Regarding the bad situation, the panda king has nothing to do but resignation. At this time, a prince named Tai Long (voiced by Ding Yan) suddenly appeared and brought a mysterious sheepskin scroll. 　　 On the sheepskin scroll, it is recorded that a place named "Panda Star" is called Panda Paradise, which is the only hope for the panda family not to perish. In this way, the heroic Tyrone and his younger brother Shang Guang (voiced by Wang Yalin) embarked on a journey full of crisis. On the other hand, the evil and greedy coyote king hated the panda clan. It sent Pandora (voiced by Ye Fang), Iron Hammer (voiced by Tang Zezong) and Hongying (voiced by Wang Xueqin) to try to bring Tyrone The group was completely wiped out. (translated from douban)

title: Feng Qing Xue Huiyilu
synopsis: After filming the whole story of the domestic stand-alone game "Gu Jian Qi Tan", it has been processed by screenwriting, editing, motion effects, mixing, dubbing and other links, and it has been adapted into an animated film with a complete plot and impressive visual effects. When Feng Qingxue saw Baili Tu Su closing her eyes in her arms, she was just sad. She once gave up her plan to serve Nuwa as a spiritual girl for Baili Tusu. But now for Baili Tusu, she decided to become a spiritual girl again, gaining those hundreds of years of life to find a way of rebirth. Hundreds of years later, the sea became a mulberry field. The crazy stories that happened in a few years when I was young have been refined and become favored. When the years have washed away the joys and sorrows of the past, the rest are memories that should not be forgotten. This is a romantic and beautiful literary film, condensing oriental love, friendship and affection.(translated from douban)

title: Miao Xiansheng Zhi Huo Ze Kui Xiao Ren Chuan
synopsis: The foggy land, a strange continent, Ding Guo, Xiao Ren, Hong Yan, a group of young people full of passion and passion. 　　 What's wrong here? 　　 Is it human greed or nature's uncompromising? 　　 Some people say that Huozawa is the supreme god. Without it, it would be over here, but why the gods can’t protect them, and the crisis worsens day by day? It is also said that the God of Fire is the initiator of all darkness, but they have lived here for hundreds of years. Why has the disaster just begun?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 妙先生之火泽睽笑人传

title: Miao Xiansheng Zhi Yan Luo Dadao
synopsis: The young ghost hunter came to the fire cicada and found that a ghost was affecting the ecological balance here. Just as he was about to remove the ghost, A Bao knelt down and asked him for forgiveness, and explained the origin of the ghost and the reason for becoming a ghost. A Bao’s friend laughed, in order to save a baby abandoned by others, accidentally offended the god of fire, which represents nature, and was assimilated by fire, leaving Ding Guo in the dilemma of killing ghosts or saving people. In the end, what kind of mentality will Ding Guo face the ghosts and charms in order to restore the world to a natural balance? (translated from douban)

title: Chongfeng Hao
synopsis: "The trumpet sounded, awakening the sleeping dragon" 　　 Dream set sail, starting with children. The vagrant tiger was rescued by the troops and embarked on a new journey with the troops. He learned to play the trumpet and wanted to become a qualified trumpeter. However, he was criticized for making mistakes. He left the troops and continued to wander alone. A huge conspiracy was found in the army before him... Did he arrive in time to prevent the tragedy from happening? Can he sound a loud trumpet to complete his dream?(translated from douban)

title: Huoyan Shan Lixian Ji
synopsis: Since Tang Seng's master and apprentice had gone through nine, nine and eighty-one hardships, he came to the Flame Mountain of the Western Regions, where the scorching sun and red heat blocked the path of learning from the western sky. Only by borrowing Princess Iron Fan’s banana fan can the fire be extinguished. Princess Iron Fan’s husband, the Bull Demon King, is Wukong’s worship brother, so Wukong is full of confidence to ask for it. Who knows that at this time, the Bull Demon King was bewitched by the spider spirit, and he had already put his wife, children, brotherhood behind. Even the sick wife doesn't care. Red Haier, the son of the Bull Demon King, is young and has a fiery sex. In order to treat his mother, he misheard the demon slander and joined the ranks of taking Tang monk meat. The Buddha heard that Wukong reported that he punished the demons in the lower realm, and at the same time surrendered the red boy who saved his mother and wounded others. The spider spirit steals the banana fan in an attempt to stop the monk Tang and his apprentice from continuing to travel west... (translated from douban)

title: Mudan Xianzi Zhi Rui Chunhua Kai
synopsis: In order to welcome the once-in-a-millennium Ruichun, the flower goddess gave the magic wand in charge of the blossoming of peony flowers to Peony Fairy and arranged for her to preside over the flowering ceremony. The day before flowering, the magic wand was suddenly lost, and the peony flower could not bloom on time. After some twists and turns, everyone discovered that the owl had stolen the magic wand. Therefore, Fairy Peony led everyone to a fierce contest with the fierce owl. In the end, Peony Fairy regained the magic wand with his ingenuity and cast a spell in time to let the flowers bloom, successfully completing the task of blooming Ruichun. (translated from douban)

title: Kun Ta: Hezi Zongdongyuan
synopsis: 1800 years ago, the planet Peanut suffered a terrible drought. Legend has it that a Baraboo named Quinta firmly believes that the world will not die, but no one believes him... So Quinta decided to find the answer alone, and finally found a dying cactus in the desert in order to make the cactus live. Afterwards, Quinta exhausted all his life energy and Baraboo was reborn. Since then, the Baraboos have named the cactus as Quinta to commemorate the hero, and predicted that when Baraboo needs another hero, Quinta will return. Many years later, the drought really came again. This time, a child named "Spinach" heard the call from Quinta. In the face of ridicule and misunderstanding, he did not give up and set foot on the "hero" together with the best friend, milk bubble. 'S journey... (translated from doubanDirector: Li Lian Screenwriter: Li Lian )

title: Kun Ta: Fan Zhuan Xingqiu
synopsis: After the greedy humans discovered the Kepler star, they frantically exploited the star’s energy creature, Cara Luo, so that the Kepler star did not grow. In order to find the last Carrara, Spinach accidentally involved in a terrifying conspiracy with his friends, Milk Bubble and Gaga. In order to save the planet, the three little heroes were not afraid of difficulties, and finally defeated him stronger than himself with bravery and wisdom. Enemy. (translaaated from douban)

title: Kun Ta·Yin Wei Suoyi
synopsis: The "Cause of Quinta" series of cartoons use popular science knowledge as the main material. The three main characters in the movie "Quinta": spinach, milk bubble, and quack are the main images. They use children's thinking and language to tell children how Various questions and answers common in life. The plot is witty, relaxed and humorous, which can attract the attention of parents and young white-collar workers at the same time. Master the knowledge of popular science while watching short stories, and learn popular science knowledge that parents have no time to teach, and even parents cannot answer.(translated from douban)

title: Le Le Xiong Qihuan Zhuizong
synopsis: Legend has it that the holy baby of the mysterious Sun Mountain can realize all kinds of wonderful wishes, but only the golden eagle clan who has guarded the holy baby for generations knows the direction of Sun Mountain. Lelexiong, Mila and Shana went to the survival training camp to learn about earthquakes. On the way, they were hit by a tsunami caused by an undersea earthquake. Lelexiong, Mila and Shana made full use of their survival knowledge and successfully transferred to a safe area, but found out The holy baby who should have been in Sun Mountain. Because the little golden eagle guarding the saint baby was lost in the tsunami, the upright Lelexiong, Mila and Shana decided to find the little golden eagle to return the saint baby. But at this time, they didn't know that the news of the appearance of the Holy Baby had spread all over the earth, arousing the ambition of everyone, and they laid many traps on the way to try to capture the Holy Baby. Lelexiong, Mila and Shana decided to use all the knowledge they learned from the survival training camp to break through all difficulties and find the little golden eagle.(translated from douban)

title: Long Zhi Gu: Poxiao Qibing
synopsis: Lambert, a wandering young man who is not doing his job, accidentally heard that the evil big black dragon's demons were preparing to capture the continent of Altria. In order to protect his hometown, he was trapped in dealing with the monsters, but was rescued by the ranger Barna and joined the ranger Geran Special, Algerta (voiced by Jing Tian) in the team. The mage leader Karaqiu (voiced by Xia Zitong) of the elves also brought Princess Nelvin and the archer's entourage Leia (voiced by Xu Jiao) to invite the human king to join the battle. Faced with the invasion of monsters, they joined the ranger team and human knights. Beskod (voiced by Hu Ge) formed an alliance against the big black dragon. Everyone came to the lair of the big black dragon through difficulties. Lambert and Leah have been in love for a long time, but they don’t know that Gerante and Algerta, and Beskod each carry unknown secrets... 　　 This film is an animated film adapted from the popular online game "Dragon Valley". It was launched by Shanda Games. The plan is to shoot a trilogy. The main story line is around the "Dragon Valley" game prequel.(translated from douban)

title: Zhangyu Ge
synopsis: Paul II, the son of the world-famous forecasting emperor octopus, to promote his father’s righteous spirit, inherit his father’s great cause of forecasting, break through the control of the gambling group, escaped from hunting for many times, and came to China to learn the forecasting skills of the father of forecasting Zhuge Liang With the help of college entrance examination candidates Shui Mengmeng and Jin Tao, wit cooperated with the police to destroy the gambling syndicate, and finally appeared on the scene of the World Cup football final. He made independent and extremely accurate predictions and became a rising star highly regarded by hundreds of millions of people.(translated from douban)

title: Shen Bi Maliang
synopsis: The story takes place in the scenic Baihua Village, where a boy named Ma Liang (played by Shao Yichen) lives. Although Ma Liang is naughty, he loves painting and is quite talented. One day, the arrival of the general (voiced by Meng Xianglong) and the little emperor (voiced by Wang Xiaotong) broke the tranquil atmosphere in the village. They learned that valuable gold mines were buried underground in the village, so they tried to drive away all the villagers and started excavation. . 　　 Pomo Immortal (voiced by Wu Wenlun) foreseeing a disaster in Baihua Village, so he gave Ma Liang the magic pen, and asked Ma Liang to use the magical power of the magic pen to turn the fictitious into reality to protect the villagers’ homes. The little emperor saw the power of the magic pen and wanted to take it as his own. The general design deceived the simple and kind-hearted Ma Liang, and prepared to use magic pen to destroy the entire village.(translated from douban)

title: Q Ban Sanguo
synopsis: When it comes to major events in the world, we must unite for a long time, and we must divide for a long time. At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, due to the incompetence of Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty, the world was in chaos, and the era of the three kingdoms in history began. Liu Bei (a cabbage planter), Guan Yu (a cow-cutter), and Zhang Fei (a pig-killer) were originally going to be recruited as soldiers. Who knew they were taken into Taoyuan Prison for no reason. brothers. After 　　 was released from prison, Liu Bei wanted to find a big guy to cover him, but Liu Bei was very unlucky, and all the big guys he worshiped would definitely die! ! The world called Liu Bei the "Big Brother Nemesis", and soon after this name came out, it became popular all over the country. Cao Cao, the owner of the "Cao Ji Knife Shop", asked Liu Bei to call the hot pot "the hero of cooking wine" out of good intentions, but Liu Bei was afraid that Cao Cao would harm him. "Hua Hua" was thrown in the Cao Mansion by himself, so he called Guan Yu back to rescue him. Cao Cao admired Guan Yu's name for a long time and used "excellent beef offal" to make Guan linger. Zhuge Liang, who had been unemployed for a few years, met Liu Bei by chance, and he was regarded as a man of heaven. Liang made a mistake and helped Liu make his business bigger and bigger. The three-part world of Liu, Cao, and Sun took shape. Then, Liang made another move. Planned three "rock climbing competitions" held in Chibi. With the help of Dongfeng, Liu Bei won a big victory. 　　 These three kingdoms are not the other three kingdoms. "The Q version of the three kingdoms" does not fight all day long like "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" or "Three Kingdoms". It wants to unify the country. Instead, it uses another way-business war to replace united war. As the saying goes: The business field is like a battlefield. The three big groups represented by Cao, Liu and Sun have fought wildly in the business field, vividly and vividly. It not only allows people to get a general understanding of the situation in the Three Kingdoms, but also does not see the blood, but also laughs and stomachaches. (translated from douban)

title: Q Ban Sanguo Zhi San Xiaoqiang
synopsis: During the reign of Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty, the ugly and ugly sisters of the flower goddess (the original "Huahua") went down to the mortal world every year, causing constant vomiting and restlessness in the world. Ma Chao, the chief rudder of the Flower Elimination Club, organized a century-level flower eradication operation. On the way, the flower god was taken away by a mysterious man who claimed to be the black elvis, and the mission was declared a failure. However, the disappearance of the god of flowers and flowers has caused great changes to the heavens. Only Liu Bei, the director of the Tianting Secret Service (“Xiaozhi” in Mandarin), who has a fairy power = 0, is not affected. The Jade Emperor and the director of the cat (the original Zhuge Liang) are appointed Liu Bei is an agent of the Heavenly Court. He went down to save the god of flowers and flowers in order to save the health of all the people in the Heavenly Court. At the same time, the mortal bald master (Tang Xuanzang) was commissioned by Tathagata to accept Wukong (in Chinese version of "Invincible"), who had made trouble in the Heavenly Palace. , Liu Bei and Invincible have any unbearable tragic experience. Guan Yu (“Xiao Ren” in Mandarin) and Zhang Fei (“Xiao Yong” in Mandarin) who were reincarnated in the past can see Liu Bei again, please go to "q Decrypt it in the version of "Three Kingdoms: Three Little Strong". 　　 After finding the Flower God, the three brothers returned to the Heavenly Court to take up positions (very busy), so they wanted to find Lang Lang and stopped. I accidentally saw that Invincible was doing a live show. Xiaozhi wanted to help Invincible, but he messed up, was caught by Lang Lang, and was forced to participate in the "Journey to the West" to fight against Master Bald. What will happen? (translated from douban)

title: San Xiaoqiang
synopsis: Xiaozhi (voiced by Han Bo), Xiaoren (voiced by Liu Pei), and Xiaoyong (voiced by Zefei) originally had handsome appearances and were proud of them, but they knew that they were contaminated with tackiness when the world was in peace. Become three reckless big men. Not only that, the three people who were unable to complete the task could not return to the heavens and were left in the world. They were also forced to enlist in the war and were in danger of death at any time. 　　 The three learned that they can only rely on true love if they want to restore their former appearance. And I learned that the one who sucked the true love of time was Lu Bu named "Three No God of War". However, Lu Bu's strength is too strong, Xiaozhi and his team have repeatedly challenged, but they all end up in failure. In the end, they discovered Lu Bu's weakness, and gathered the world to send all the true love into Lu Bu's hollow heart, and finally defeated it.(translated from douban)

title: Mohuan Xian Zong
synopsis: Fairy Minghui’s daughter Hai Ying has lived in seclusion in a small fishing village since she was a child, but she has been involved in a battle between justice and evil by a magician full of evil and ambition. She has gone through all kinds of dangers, and with the help of many friends, she has repeatedly escaped from the magician. Demon Claw, and bravely defeated the Flame Demon, restored world order and peace, and returned to his mother(translated from douban)

title: Mohuan Xian Zong Zhi Mama Qu Na'er
synopsis: Hai Ying (voiced by Yi Yi) has lost her parents since she was a child and lives a lonely life in a small fishing village near the sea. Because she is alone, Hai Ying is often bullied by other children. However, the kind Hai Ying just chooses to endure silently. Hai Ying felt that if she could find her mother, then she would be able to gain the approval of her friends. In this way, the little girl embarked on a long journey to find her mother. 　　 I don’t know that Sea Infant was kidnapped by pirates not long after we set off. Everyone travelled all the way to the Fairy City, and unexpectedly lifted the seal to make the evil Flame Demon reappear in the world. The mighty flame demon attempts to destroy the entire world, and only the crystal sword can surrender it. Through the heartfelt feelings with her mother, Hai Ying finally found the treasure. Can she use her own power to defeat evil and protect the peace of the world? (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 魔幻仙踪之妈妈去哪儿

title: Wo Shi Lang Zhi Huolong Shanda Maoxian
synopsis: The story takes place in an isolated paradise, where lovely bunny ears and his good brother White Wolf live. Although White Wolf is a wolf, he has always lived with the rabbit family. Not only that, he himself does not know his true identity. One day, the priest in the village accidentally discovered the identity of the White Wolf, making him the biggest safety hazard in the village. 　　In order to drive away the white wolf, the priest gave him the task of going to the Fire Dragon Mountain to get the fruit of life. From the priest's point of view, this is destined to be a journey full of danger with no return. White Wolf and Ear set off together. What awaited them was a series of accidents and countless troubles. The two brothers worked together to overcome one difficulty after another, and finally stood under the fire dragon mountain. What kind of adventure will be waiting for them? (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 我是狼之火龙山大冒险

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Chengshi Yingxiong
synopsis: Many years ago, people were in panic on the earth because of the appearance of the monster water spirit, and everywhere in the city was always facing the destruction of water spirit. People fled around, avoiding the impact of demons. At this critical moment, we encountered the most powerful combination that has never been seen in any era: the 12 zodiac patron saint. Represented by the zodiac rat, this is a power incarnation that defends justice, is full of hope, and punishes evil. The zodiac rat led twelve heroes, using their respective skills, to defeat the water spirit and defend the safety of the city. 　　 However, after the event was over, the over-easy life unexpectedly smoothed the heroes' spirit, and they began to live in peace and gradually forget their mission. At this time, the cunning Mayor of Flower Cat took advantage of the loopholes and took the opportunity to provoke discord. The hero group was faced with disintegration and crisis. In the chaos, the demon water spirit escaped, disrupting the city and hurting the innocent! The heroes are about to face more severe challenges! In order to get together again, they took out their newly-trained skills and fought against the monsters and water spirits for hundreds of rounds, becoming the most admired heroes in this city!(translated from douban)

title: Baixue Gongzhu Zhi Airen Liliang
synopsis: The news that Snow White is still alive and living a happy life with the prince spread like wildfire. It spread to the ears of the evil queen. The queen who wanted to eradicate Snow White was so angry that she found the fire wizard. Conspiracy, trying to kill Snow White again. 　　 One day, Snow White and the prince received a message from the dwarf who invited them to a party. However, it was the queen herself who sent the message. Unknowingly, Snow White and the prince came to the meeting place and were attacked by the enemy. In the end, the prince was captured and taken prisoner, while Snow White fell into the waterfall in an accident. Fortunately, Snow White got the help of the dwarf. She decided to cooperate with the dwarf and embark on a journey to rescue the prince. In the end, can Snow White expose the queen's conspiracy and successfully rescue her sweetheart? (translated from douban)

title: Xin Dilei Zhan: Shenyong Xiaozi
synopsis: After the outbreak of the War of Resistance Against Japan, the Japanese army made every effort to kill and looted our compatriots. The people hated it, but unfortunately, the weak and the invaders were not allowed. The Japanese marched into the Central Plains, and the leading troops came to the must pass fortress: Maijiacun. 　　 The Japanese army leader Noda Ichiro originally thought that Xiaomai’s family village, facing the Japanese gold and iron horses, mechanized troops, should be captured with nothing, and thus fell. Unexpectedly, at the most critical moment, Mai Bao's father contacted the villagers in the neighboring villages and formed a guerrilla team to make landmines and resist tenaciously by using nitrate, sulfur, and charcoal to make gunpowder. For a time, the Japanese army repeatedly retreated, and was even more frightened of the Maijia mines. Ye Tian’s cunning and cunning decided to arrest the Chinese on a large scale, threatening a few cowardly people to become traitors, and mixed into the Maijiacun guerrillas. They should cooperate inside and outside, and the agile Maibao man who broke the landmines was agile, and wanted to fight side by side with Mai’s father. Stop, thinking that Mai Bao should be literate by reading, and will do more in the future. Mai Bao dedicated himself to serving the country, and followed his grandfather's troupe into Liangcheng where the Japanese army was located to perform the patriotic play "Jing Wu Men", awakening the people's sleeping patriotism, and was unfortunately arrested. In prison, Mai Bao met Xu Sandong, a Communist Party member who disguised as a traitor and broke into the enemy. With the help of Sandong, Mai Bao escaped from death and became a little undercover. Mai Bao looked for an opportunity to feign intent to flatter the Japanese army, and even used ancestral Chinese medicine stunts, and soon became a favorite in Noda's eyes. At this time, Noda also successfully bought the villager Cai Ding as a spy to join the guerrillas. At this point, the undercover vs. undercover situation still arises. 　　 After Grandpa Mai waited for a group of villagers to be arrested, Father Mai decided to attack the Japanese army headquarters at night to save people. Unexpectedly, Cai Ding informed Noda of this news. The Japanese army decided to do everything possible. They tied the villagers to wooden stakes and put on soldiers' clothes, and put their soldiers in villagers' clothes. When the guerrillas arrived, they would be wiped out in one fell swoop. When the night fell, the Maibao scene saw that his grandpa and others were passed on to the Japanese military uniforms. Mai Bao struggled inwardly. The ambush led the team to arrive. Fortunately, Mai Bao was clever, climbed up the city wall, flashed the Morse code with the searchlight flashing, and Father Mai received the information and walked away. When Noda saw the Morse code of the searchlight, he was suspicious, and Mai Bao blamed Xiao Chun on the captain's confidant, and Xiao Chun had a scapegoat. 　　 Cai Ding broke the news again that the guerrillas found that the gunpowder was exhausted and the materials were not enough, so they decided to enter the Japanese barracks to steal gunpowder. Maibao and Sandongli should unite outside, resorting to the strategy of adjusting the tiger away from the mountain and cooperating with the guerrillas to get the gunpowder. Finally got the gunpowder, and even the Japanese landmines. However, the Japanese mine detection team was ordered to arrive. Mai Bao once again used the kite to send news, but was destroyed by Xiao Chun, and Ye Tian was suspicious of everyone and dragged Xiao. Spring, Sandong, Mai Bao, etc. play games. Mai Bao's avatar lacked skills and could not release the news. Maijiacun was at stake. In the crisis, Mai Bao once again used the imagination of a child to come up with a clever way to decide and send the information. However, even Mai Bao himself did not know whether Father Mai could notice the details of the information transmitted, no There is another way, just give it a try. 　　 The Japanese army gathered people and the mine detection team leader Kameda led the mine detection team, and Noda couldn't help but feel triumphant. Mai Bao saw Kameda and Xiao Chun vying for favor in front of Noda and tried to divorce them, making them intolerable. The two competed for the first prize and helped detect mines. Unexpectedly, Father Mai had already received the news that he bought broken iron in the ground. Instead of detecting the mine, the two stepped on the mine and shouted for help. The Japanese army marched forward. , Was trapped by a mine array, causing numerous casualties. Noda had no choice but to summon gold to retreat and consider the long term. Noda was reluctant to fight and lose, but because of Cai Ding's reminder that he learned that there was an undercover around him, and began to distrust everyone. It's night, Noda re-entangled with his men and horses, trying to attack Maijia Village in the dark. The villagers like Grandpa and other villagers were the first to step on landmines. The grandfather and the others regarded death as home, and the righteousness Lingran, Mai Bao felt uncomfortable, but could not show it. What is more important is how to inform the father. Seeing that he was about to enter the minefield, Mai Bao suddenly came up with a masterpiece again, and his father led the guerrillas to rescue the villagers. 　　 Noda returned to the camp, yelling, and locked his suspicions on Mai Bao, Xiao Chun, Sandong and Kameda. Noda decided to take everyone to the ultimate place for interrogation of prisoners-Wind Sound Castle. Noda resorted to various tricks in the movie "The Sound of the Wind" to everyone. Although they all ended in jokes, the day when Noda's "I would rather kill the wrong, never let it go" policy of catching undercover agents is becoming more and more tight. Sandong decided to fight for the last time and was eventually escaped by the two of them, but Sandong was shot. Mai Bao vowed to avenge Sandong and the countless reports of killings by Noda and drive them out of Maijia Village. To drive all Japanese devils out of China. 　　 Mai Bao returned to Maijia Village, the first task was to find out the undercover guerrillas. The father and son Mai Bao sang the double song, and father Mai deliberately resigned from the position of guerrilla captain. He endured the humiliation and secretly found the undercover Cai Ding. At this time, Nodazai didn't have the patience to play, and finally used his killer-the tank. Noda gathered 50 tanks and drove mightily to Maijiacun, trying to razor it to the ground. The battle between landmines and tanks is about to start! 　　 Maibao used landmines to set off bombs and blow up the first tank. The father of Mai Bao pulled the stone mine and blew up the mountain, trapping all Japanese tanks in Maijia Village immobile. The villagers threw countless fires and burned their houses. In an instant, the entire Maijia Village turned into a sea of ​​flames. The tanks received high temperature, and some exploded naturally. The Japanese soldiers escaped from the tank and caught fire. Looking at a sea of ​​flames, tears were in everyone's eyes. 　　 Under the leadership of Mai Bao and his father, finally, the guerrillas defeated the Japanese army and held on to Maijia Village, which turned into a sea of ​​joy.(translated from douban)

title: Xihu Chuanqi
synopsis: The dragon prince Yulong, who came to the world after drinking the water forgotten love, and the pearl of the clam girl who came also, met again and wanted to love. In order to save Mingzhu's life, Yulong went through all difficulties and overcame all difficulties. In the end, their love overcame everything. The two turned into mountains and waters, showing the eternal love and faith. (translated from douban)

title: Sui Cheng Li Xin-Guiyu Zhou Yuan
synopsis: Gucheng, hidden in the mountains, contains secret medicine, called "Ghost Curse Original". At that time, mountains and rivers were devastated, chaos was endless, natural and man-made calamities, and the people didn't live forever. Everyone in the world admires the magic of "Ghost Curse Original", and cannot desire it. One day, elite soldiers and strong horses appeared outside the city, and the city was in a hurry. The city owner had no choice but to sacrifice the strongest weapon in the world, called "Black Kirin". As a result, the gate of the city opened wide, and a man with red hair holding a three-zhang Wujin long sword, went out of the gate and faced the thousands of troops... (translated from douban)

title: Gui Tu Zai Pao
synopsis: One day, the farmer who went out brought back four rabbits. When he first arrived, these four strange rabbits and the four turtles living on the farm were in peace and divided the world equally. However, over time, the rabbits gradually discovered that the owner's preference for tortoises is much greater than for them. 　　 The rabbits attributed the reason to the previous tortoise and the hare race. The rabbit gained the advantage but eventually lost, and was ridiculed by the world. Therefore, the angry rabbits are determined to have another tortoise and the hare race to rectify the name of the race. Under the rabbit's constant provocation and agitation, the turtle fell into a trap and agreed to the rabbit's competition requirements. The day of the race is approaching. Will this iconic race repeat the tragedy of the past or create another miracle? At the same time, everyone did not realize that they had been involved in a conspiracy. (translated from douban)

title: Miao Xing Shaonian Piaoliu Ji
synopsis: The film is adapted from the famous French novelist Jules Verne, the father of modern science fiction novels, "Fifteen Boys Drifting". The story tells the story of 15 teenagers in Ocean Park secretly boarding the "Moon" expedition submarine, and then embarking on an exploratory adventure. On the way back from the underwater adventure, 15 teenagers were involved in a black hole and then encountered a storm. The attack, clashed with another pirate ship, and was taken to an uninhabited island by the storm. In order to survive on the uninhabited island and wait for rescue, the cat teenagers tried every means to find food, build huts, and defeat all kinds of beasts. With perseverance and superhuman wisdom, the brave teenagers not only overcome the harsh natural environment, Also dealt with and fight with pirates witty. In the end, they heroically wiped out the pirates and returned home smoothly. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Ye You
synopsis: The world of God, outside the world, is like the world. As night falls, the cruising night cruisers should come to work. In that dreamlike Dongfu Wonderland, a rather untimely alarm clock rang, and on the nearby patches of clouds, the small night travel gods were awakened one after another. Their positions seem to be decreasing from top to bottom. The interns who were on the seventh floor were reminded by the female seniors on the sixth floor and fell heavily to the ground. He lazily turned off the alarm clock, but he was attracted by the sudden blue light spot. He was completely sleepy, trying to catch the bright spot, but also to show off to his predecessors. As everyone knows, the blue light spot is the reflection of the golden lock on his neck. Soon, the small night travel gods woke up one after another. They clamored and quarreled over the light spot. 　　 The moonlight is bright, the naughty little guys should go outside... (translated from doubanDirector: Wang Wei Screenwriter: Wang Wei )

title: Shen Jian Chuanqi
synopsis: Once upon a time, there was an unparalleled Sun God Sword, whoever can get it will greatly increase his skill and become the master of the world. The Excalibur appeared once in hundreds of years, and this time it caused a battle between good and evil headed by Daoist Baiyun and the demon sect headed by the black wind leader. But no one thought that the key to this victory or defeat was determined by an ordinary but destined little boy, Jin Doudou, who would write a heroic legend... (translated from douban)

title: Modeng Senlin: Shengming Zhi Shui
synopsis: Unidentified pollutants invaded modern forests and destroyed water sources. In order to protect the homeland and the survival of the residents, Xiaolong, New Year's Day, and Dandan launched an adventure journey in the modern forest to find and eliminate the source of pollution in the modern forest. In the process, the friends rescued the villages and residents passing by, drove away the vandals headed by Dr. Black, and restored the modern forest to its former beauty and peace. Unidentified pollutants invaded modern forests and destroyed water sources. title: Modeng Senlin Zhi Meishi Zongdongyuan
synopsis: The story takes place in a beautiful modern village. A huge food competition is about to kick off. Carnivores Dan Dan, vegetarian Yuan Yuan and Xiaolong all participated in the competition. However, in an accident, three people I knocked down the sacred "Food Stele", and then traversed into a different-dimensional time and space called the World of Food by mistake. 　　 There, Yuan Yuan, who only eats vegetarian but not meat, happened to fall on the altar of the meat clan’s castle, and became a meat god sought after by the meat clan inexplicably, making Yuan Yuan very troubled. On the other side, Dan Dan and Xiaolong met a vegetable elf named Xiaoqiang, and the elf told them about the meat clan’s conspiracy to rule the food world. Knowing that Yuanyuan had fallen into the hands of the meat clan, Dan Dan and Xiaoqiang resolutely embarked on a journey to find friends and save the food world. (translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Xun Lixian Ji
synopsis: The little Chinese sturgeon swims with his companions from the Yangtze River to the sea, and is separated from the large group due to snooze. The little Chinese sturgeon had to swim to the sea alone. Along the way, he made friends and defeated enemies. At the entrance to the sea, the little Chinese sturgeon found a Chinese sturgeon of the same family. At this time, the leader is about to take everyone to find the "Dream City" of Chinese sturgeon. The little Chinese sturgeon and his friends also participate in it and swim along the Yangtze River. The migratory road was extremely thrilling. The enemy that the little Chinese sturgeon had offended before lay in ambush along the road. With the help of friends and companions, the little Chinese sturgeon defeated the enemy and protected the people, and finally reached the "City of Dreams." At this time, he can already be on his own and grow into a new leader.(translated from douban)
