title: Shaonian Maozedong
synopsis: The story takes place in the remote Shaoshan Chongli, where a boy named Shi Sanyao (voiced by Xie Qiheng) lives. Shi Sanyao's ancestors have been honest farmers for generations, his father Naturally, I also hope that my son can face the loess with his back to the sky, and use his laborious hands to open up his future. 　　 However, Shi Sanyao didn't think so. Although he was young, his ambitions were extremely lofty. One day, Shi Sanya picked up a small bird's egg, but hatched a huge bird from the egg. The shocked Shi Sanya felt that he was this bird, and one day he would soar into the sky. . Shi Sanyao didn’t want to be a farmer. This made his father feel very distressed. The father and son often quarreled about this. However, in Shi Sanyao’s body, his father also saw strong vitality and an infinitely broad future. . (translated from douban)

title: Qiche Ren Zongdongyuan
synopsis: The 8-year-old boy Kaka is smart and lively. He is a top automotive engineer. With the help of his assistant and playmate Ding Ding, he developed a chip called "K System". The K system can realize high-intelligence operation and realize human-vehicle dialogue. The first K1 to roll off the assembly line said cheerful love, and soon became one with Tintin. Kaka was not satisfied. He continued to develop the calm and calm K2 and the near-perfect K3. Before long, Kaka received the invitation letter of the "Advanced Smart Car Competition". He was full of confidence and decided to take three baby cars to participate in the competition. For this reason, he specially customized a rigorous training plan for the three cars. As the race is approaching day by day, what results will these three smart cars with full of personality achieve?(translated from douban)

title: Baixur Gongzhu Zhi Shenmi Baba
synopsis: Hannah (voiced by Gao Mingjue) lost her father since childhood. Everyone said that he had gone to another world. Only Hannah firmly believed that her father was still alive. With a magical feather, Hannah embarked on a journey to find her father alone. She wanted to find the god bird, because the god bird knew the whereabouts of her father. 　　 In the midst of an accidental hit, Hannah broke into the wooden house of the dwarfs in the forest. Knowing Hannah's life experience, Snow White (voiced by Yan Mengmeng) and the dwarves were deeply moved and determined to help Hanna find her father. The group got on the hot air balloon and headed towards the bird island where the sacred bird lives. Along the way, Hannah and the others encountered natural and man-made disasters, but they did not stop moving forward. In the end, they arrived at their destination smoothly and learned that the disappearance of their father and the evil queen (voiced by Lin Lan) are unclear. relationship.(translated from douban)

title: Mo Jing Qi Yuan
synopsis: In the previous game, the evil queen was finally punished by justice. Snow White and the prince stepped into the palace of marriage hand in hand and lived a happy life. However, this beautiful scene like a fairy tale is not the end of the story. One day, Snow White stood in front of the mirror and found that her face had pimples. She who no longer had beauty, was able to keep the prince. Your heart? 　　 Not only Snow White, the dwarves, hunters, and princes have all stood at the crossroads of their lives. Should they choose profit or loyalty? Everyone has their different opinions. The accidents that appeared one after another were not accidental, but a conspiracy designed by the queen and the magic mirror who wanted revenge. The knight with the holy sword appears, can he become the savior? (translated from douban)

title: Mo Jing Qi Yuan 2
synopsis: The film is adapted from a classic fairy tale. A long time ago, in the depths of the Goga Sea, a friendship tree grew. The friendship tree only bears a fruit every thousand years. The little mermaid Princess Ariel maintains the Goga Sea and has the infinite treasures of the entire ocean, but because the road to the friendship tree is extremely difficult, she failed to get a friendship fruit... The beautiful little girl Serra lives in the Goga Sea By the sea, in order to get a drop of Snow White’s blood to heal her seriously ill mother, Serra passed a magic mirror to the fantasy and mysterious underwater world, so she met the little mermaid, Princess Ariel, and became Cynthia who was looking for the gem of time. A good friend, accompanied by the little mermaid elf Kashan and the little sea shrimp Kelly, embarked on a fantasy adventure under the sea in search of friendship fruits and time gems. (translated from douban)

title: Mo Jing Qi Yuan 3
synopsis: The brave and resolute little princess in the fairy tale world is a girl with outstanding martial arts but a little rebellious. On this day, the lava demon began to act again for revenge, trying to get rid of the princess, the "nemesis." The lava demon has an all-knowing magic mirror, and the magic mirror suggested that he send the "little fire demon" Fryer to sneak into the princess as a man, looking for an opportunity to kill her. In order to save her kingdom, the princess embarked on a journey to find the magic mirror. In this adventure, the princess and the "Little Fire Demon" established a deep friendship. In the end, the "little fire demon" sacrificed himself in order to save the princess, and the princess also defeated the magic mirror and saved his country.(translated from douban)

title: Meirenyu Zhi Haidao Lai Xi
synopsis: One day, the mermaid Annie (voiced by Li Sixian) met the captain’s daughter Susan who was in the water and was crying for help. Although the sea god repeatedly warned Annie not to get involved with human affairs, the kind-hearted Annie still couldn’t sit back and watch, so she helped her. Escort all the way back to the harbor. 　　 On the way, the ship the two were on was attacked by pirates, and the clever and brave Anne relied on her own wisdom to play around the group of reckless men, and finally subdued them. I didn't know that the naughty pet monkey opened the prison door and released the pirates, and a group of people were once again in crisis. By accident, Annie discovered that these pirates were not hopeless, so she decided to help them get back on track. The big ship hit a reef and sank, and a group of people on the ship drifted onto an isolated island. I didn't know that there were dangerous giants living on the island. (translated from douban)

title: Ao La Xing: Jinji Sheng Dian
synopsis: The protagonist Donghuang Taiyi (voiced by Li Zhengxiang) is the guardian of the ancient temple. When the ancient temple was invaded, he was ordered to flee to Aura with the "Wuji". After being hit hard, he lost his memory and turned into a cute Abi, and was killed The pull star "Landing (voiced by Zhang Anqi)" took in, named "Tai Er". Tai Er (voiced by Zhang Qi) gradually adapted to the life of Aura and met some friends. They discovered the conspiracy of the dark forces and worked hard to protect Aura. In the process, Tai Er also began to restore his memory and shoulder the difficulties of recovering the temple. mission…… (translated from douban)

title: Fengle! Gui Bao
synopsis: It tells that in the world of the genius inventor Gui Bao, everything is alive and has its own personality. They have a lot of happenings with Gui Bao, A Qin, Chun Niu, A Tao and other human friends Novel and funny story! (translated from douban)

title: Tianyan Chuanqi
synopsis: It is about the protagonist Tianyan, who has "wisdom" eyes, is born with great power and is different. In order to hone his will and improve himself, he learns from a teacher. On the way, Tianyan strayed into the magical world. After learning about its internal disputes, he stepped forward to resolve it. In the process, he understood the mystery of martial arts, learned the world's best swordsmanship, and eventually defeated the Blue Devil and helped restore the Samsung civilization. (translated from douban)

title: Long Zai Nali?
synopsis: Five hundred years ago, the dragon (voiced by Leehom Wang) suddenly disappeared. Feng (voiced by Zhang Ziyi) temporarily replaced the dragon. The Jade Emperor decreed that if the dragon is not found within three days, the zodiac will be re-elected. The zodiac officials collectively dispatched to search for the dragon, and found that the human girl Xiaozhen actually held a dragon scale, which may be the key clue to finding the dragon. Cockroaches secretly destroy the zodiac post, and the journey to find the dragon is full of difficulties and obstacles. The zodiac officials with different personalities share the responsibility and joy. In order to keep the world stable and save the family facing breakup, Xiaozhen and the zodiac animals embarked on a wonderful and warm adventure. Finally, with wisdom and courage, she found the missing dragon and restored the zodiac establishment. Order of heaven and earth. This film tells the adventure story of the mysterious disappearance of the dragon, and the 11th zodiac officer looking for the dragon with a hint of clues to prevent the zodiac from re-electing the world in chaos.(translated from douban)

title: Mo Ri Gen
synopsis: The evil air from hell invaded the creatures in the barbaric world. Before everything was destroyed, a sacred hunter shot angry bullets at the evil forces, but they inspired the evil forces even more! This unstoppable evil force eroded the creatures in the barbaric world and gradually bred into an invincible devil. When the devil met resistance, it became stronger! Mankind has encountered the destructive power from the devil. This destructive power is concentrated in the god bear of the barbaric empire, and the fire of vengeance burning in the god bear can erupt before civilization collapses! The brave Murigan hunter shot the last arrow at the devil at the last moment of his life... (translated from douban)

title: Zang Ling Wangzhixue Yu Jingling
synopsis: The story takes place in the beautiful Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. The inaccessible snowy glaciers are the only homes for animals to survive. Shulu is a Tibetan antelope that hasn't been born long. Following in the footsteps of its mother, they are on an annual breeding trip and are about to return to their hometown. However, at this juncture, evil poachers appeared. Under their hunt, Shulu's mother unfortunately fell off the cliff. Fortunately, Shulu escaped. 　　 On the vast expanse of miles and miles, the cold winter is approaching, and Lulu is alone, not knowing where to go. The appearance of Tumo Cara and Behringer Sida brought hope to Shulu. With their company, Shulu began to learn the skills necessary for survival. The winter passed, and the young antelope horns grew on her head. It was determined to return home by its own strength. (translated from douban)

title: Tuzi Zhen De Huo Huli
synopsis: Rabbit Town and Fox Town have been resentful for a long time, and generations are not at the same time. The lustful Chief Fox (voiced by Li Zhiwei) has been trying to occupy the picturesque Rabbit Town, but Rabbit Town is protected by a magical "Guardian Treasure", so that Chief Fox cannot start. Firefox Dingdong (voiced by Qiao Shiyu) is the smartest inventor in Fox Town, so the Chief Fox sends it secretly to Rabbit Town to inquire about the whereabouts of the Guardian Book and steal it. After coming to Rabbit Town, Dingdong caused a lot of trouble and made a lot of jokes. It got acquainted with Wuying Rabbit (voiced by Chen Hao), Eye Rabbit (voiced by Shang Hong) and Sleepwalking Rabbit (voiced by Zhang Wei) After waiting for his friends, as time passed, the harmonious and friendly atmosphere in Rabbit Town gradually became infected with Ding Dong. He decided to abandon his mission and join forces with his friends in Rabbit Town to resist the invasion of Chief Fox.(translated from douban)

title: Jidi Da Fangong
synopsis: Bufei lost contact with his grandfather, and Ouli and Lake helped Bufei embark on a journey home, but they encountered an attack by an unknown person as soon as they arrived in Antarctica. 　　Oli and the others escaped, and finally found a new settlement for the Penguin tribe, but they were expelled by the Penguin family. It turned out that Bufei's grandfather betrayed the entire penguin family, whose habitat has been occupied by humans. Buffy and the others decided to find out the truth. They came to the human base to find out, but unfortunately they were caught. Only Ouli escaped the pursuit of humans. 　　 At this time, Ouli faces many challenges. How can he rescue his friends? What is the connection between Bufei's grandfather and humans? What is the conspiracy of mankind? (translated from douban)

title: Long Qi Xia
synopsis: The story takes place on the picturesque Green Island. Once, the evil Black Captain was placed in the hands of the brave and valiant Dragoon. However, the Black Captain did not completely disappear, and the Dragoon lost his power and transformed. For the statue. Guoguo is an ordinary flower-giving boy who lives on the Green Island. When the black captain wants to make a comeback and the Elven Continents are in crisis again, Guoguo has become the successor of the Dragoon and shoulders the mission of saving people’s lives. . 　　 With the help and company of friends, Guoguo and his group marched towards the Eye of the Storm, where the powerful dragon power and clues to defeat the Black Governor were hidden. The journey was full of battles and dangers. The immature Guoguo wanted to prove his abilities, but he plunged his partners into crisis. The discouraged Guoguo realized that the hero was not so good, he thought of giving up.(translated from douban)

title: Chao Neng Long Qi Xia
synopsis: The new Dragon Knight, the flower-giving young Guoguo once sealed the evil black captain with the help of a good friend. After a long and unremarkable life, Guoguo's heart began to agitate again. However, he pursued speed and strength and could only use his heroic blood to fight his uncle. Accompanied by a bizarre fire, a water elf named Tick completely subverted his life, and a new adventure began. 　　 Guoguo once again convened old partners Miao Miao and Xiao Tou Si to venture into the mysterious water elf factory, only to discover that behind the elf factory, which seems to be prosperous and prosperous on the ground, actually hides terrible secrets! In the face of the hospitable fire demon and the mystery of the whereabouts of Brother Yin, who is the real owner of the factory? And is it a misunderstanding or a fateful showdown waiting for Guoguo? How did the once cute and timid little flame turn into a arrogant fire demon? Could there be more mysterious powers hidden behind the truth? All these disputes and answers are waiting for Dragon Knight Guoguo to reveal one by one with the wisdom of the heart. 　　The ambitious man behind the scenes step by step, please enter the urn, Guoguo is in crisis of life and death! Can he and his partners untie the knot and let the clear and delicious spring water flow in the beautiful mountains and rivers of Shuizhizhou again? Although growth is accompanied by infinite troubles, the young hero Dragoon will surely prove once again that he can change the whole world with love and courage on a difficult journey! (translated from douban)
